overview:
I’m Jay ar Lord Anthony S. Capin, I’ve been using word press because of work as an SEO of 1+1=3. 1+1=3 is a new company in Calgary, Alberta, Canada but have a 200 clients that give us trust to optimize their websites and believe me many of this sites are number 1 on rankings or in top 10 spots on page 1 of the Google, Yahoo, Bing search engine. SEO (Search Engine Optimization) is a widely term covering the process of improving the visibility of the ranking of a website in search engines.

As a SEO, the best thing to market (I don’t know if the word “market” is the right term) our clients websites is in making blogs and article. Submitting links, websites and directories is only one of the strategies we make to improve the visibility of the ranking of our clients websites.
